From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 film by Roger Kumble


Beautiful WeddingTheatrical release posterDirected byRoger KumbleScreenplay byRoger KumbleBased onA Beautiful Weddingby Jamie McGuireProduced by

CinematographyTheo van de SandeEdited byJustin ReederMusic bySam EwingProductioncompanyVoltage PicturesDistributed byVertical EntertainmentRelease date

Running time94 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglishBox office$478,582 (international only)[1]
Beautiful Wedding is a 2024 American romantic comedy film written and directed by Roger Kumble. It is based on Jamie McGuire's 2013 novel A Beautiful Wedding, and serves as the sequel to Beautiful Disaster (2023). 
The film was released in theaters for by Fathom Events for two nights starting on January 24, 2024. It was released on digital platforms by Vertical Entertainment on February 13, 2024.


Premise[edit]
Abby and Travis wake up after a crazy night in Vegas as accidental newlyweds.

Cast[edit]

Dylan Sprouse as Travis Maddox
Virginia Gardner as Abby Abernathy
Austin North as Shepley
Libe Barer as America
Rob Estes as Benny
Steven Bauer as Sancho
Kyle Richards as Vivian Hayes
Alex Aiono as Miguel
Emmanuel Kabongo as Buzz
Declan Laird as Taylor Maddox
Trevor Van Uden as Thomas Maddox
Jack Hesketh as Trenton Maddox
Micky Dartford as Tyler Maddox
Neil Bishop as Parker Hayes
Production[edit]
In September 2023, it was announced that the sequel to 2023's Beautiful Disaster  titled Beautiful Wedding was set to be released. Roger Kumble returned to direct along with the main cast also returning.[2] Principal photography took place at the end of 2022 in the Dominican Republic.[3]

Release[edit]
Like with the first film, Beautiful Wedding was released in the United States in limited theaters by Fathom Events for two nights starting January 24, 2024.[4][5]  The film was released on digital platforms by Vertical Entertainment on February 13, 2024.
